name: Mathics
body:
Mathics is a free, general-purpose online computer algebra system featuring Mathematica-compatible syntax and functions. It is backed by highly extensible Python code, relying on [SymPy](http://sympy.org/) for most mathematical tasks.

## Use Mathics online
Mirrors:
* http://www.mathics.net/
* http://angusgriffith.com:8000/

## Download and install Mathics
[Download](https://github.com/mathics/Mathics/releases/latest)

[Installation guide](https://github.com/mathics/Mathics/wiki/Installing)

## Documentation
[Browse online](http://www.mathics.net/doc/)

[Download PDF](http://mathics.org/doc/mathics.pdf)

## [Get the source code](https://github.com/mathics/Mathics/)
[Report a bug](https://github.com/mathics/Mathics/issues)

**Wanted**: Developers! Please get in touch if you want to be part of this awesome project.

Mathics, [mathics.org](http://www.mathics.org/), and [mathics.net](http://www.mathics.net/) were created by [Jan PÃ¶schko](http://www.poeschko.com/) @poeschko. The github project is currently maintained by Angus Griffith @sn6uv and Ben Jones @bnjones.

[Powered by MathJax](http://www.mathjax.org/) Mathics uses MathJax to display beautiful math.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
